thread.title: Audrey Tan Joins Korn Ferry as Senior Client Partner in Singapore

author: cnbc.com
title: Audrey Tan Joins Korn Ferry as Senior Client Partner in Singapore
text:
SINGAPORE--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Korn Ferry (NYSE:KFY) today announced that Audrey Tan has joined Korn Ferry as a senior client partner in Singapore.
Tan has over 18 years of leadership search and consulting experience in the Asia Pacific region. She is an advisor to private and public companies on Board & C-suite search and succession planning, top team effectiveness and culture. She works closely with local and multinational companies within the Financial Services and Technology industries.
Tan spent 15 years with a multinational executive search firm where she held several leadership positions, most recently as the Managing Partner for the Singapore office.
Before joining the search and consulting industry, Audrey worked at a subsidiary of the Economic Development Board Singapore where she was actively involved in early corporate governance, entrepreneurship, and technology initiatives. She spent her earlier career with Compaq and Hewlett-Packard.
Audrey holds a B.A. in Economics and Statistics from National University of Singapore and attended the Executive Leadership program at Wharton, University of Pennsylvania. Fluent in English, Mandarin and several local dialects, Audrey is passionate about the development of Singapore and Southeast Asia companies and talent in the region.
About Korn Ferry
Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm. We help companies design their organization â€“ the structure, the roles and responsibilities, as well as how they compensate, develop and motivate their people. As importantly, we help organizations select and hire the talent they need to execute their strategy. Our approximately 7,000 colleagues serve clients in more than 50 countries.
